# 2x2 Solver v1.1.1 - Web Streaming Support

This release adds real-time solution streaming to the browser helper and simplifies CDN integration.

## ‚ú® New Features

### Real-time Solution Streaming for Web
The browser helper (`solver-helper.js`) now supports the `onSolution` callback, enabling real-time solution streaming just like the Node.js version:

```javascript
const solutions = await helper.solve(scramble, {
  maxSolutions: 5,
  allowedMovesArray: ['U', 'U2', "U'", 'R', 'R2', "R'", 'F', 'F2', "F'"],
  onProgress: (depth) => console.log(`Depth: ${depth}`),
  onSolution: (solution) => {
    console.log(`Found: ${solution}`);
    displaySolution(solution); // Update UI immediately!
  }
});
```

Benefits:
- Solutions appear immediately as they're found
- Enables responsive UIs with live updates
- API consistency between Node.js and browser environments

### Auto-loading tools.js from CDN
When loading `solver-helper.js` from CDN, `tools.js` is now automatically loaded:

```html
<!-- Just load solver-helper.js - tools.js loads automatically! -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/or18/RubiksSolverDemo@2x2-solver-v1.1.1/dist/src/2x2solver/solver-helper.js"></script>
```

No need to manually add a `<script>` tag for `tools.js` anymore!

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed missing `currentSolutions.push()` in solution handler - solutions now correctly accumulate in the results array
- Removed duplicate cleanup code in error handler
